main event: An unidentifiable object was sighted travelling in a westerly direction over St John's, Newfoundland on 31 July 1950.
interesting points: The object was seen as a bright greenish light under the overcast sky., It appeared to break into two distinct pieces which then became dull colored lights and disappeared., The sighting lasted for about 10 seconds., The object moved very quickly and in a straight line without making any sound., Multiple military personnel from Pepperrell Air Force Base observed the same event.
witness description: Military personnel from Pepperrell Air Force Base and an auditor general from the USAF.
